title: Where is the legacy skin sale? (PLEASE HELP)
body: These skins are supposed to be on sale today but they are not in the shop as on sale, please help, i cant afford to get the ones i want unless they are on sale because there are so many becoming legacy. and they are only supposed to be on sale today

replies.body: Hey Garenplank, the sale times were incorrect and weren't meant to start until 5 PM. The sale has now started as planned and we've updated the article. Sorry for the confusion.
Yea I'm wondering where it is too.
